description: Situated in the charming village of Bagno di Romagna and surrounded by beautiful rolling hills, Teverini is a culinary name full of history in this area. The cuisine here demonstrates different traditions – the local region is an obvious influence (especially its mushrooms), but fish and seafood also feature along with plenty of vegetables.
